about_the_game:
"Fishing" is a casual competitive game themed around deep-sea hunting. The game is presented in 3D graphics, immersing players in a beautiful underwater world where they can use various fishing skills to enjoy the thrill of catching big fish. The game features a wide variety of fish, ranging from cute clownfish to fierce sharks, each with its unique characteristics and point values.

Gameplay

  • Basic Operations: Players capture fish by firing bullets, and the power of the bullets and the point values of the fish determine the amount of gold coins players earn.

Fun Aspects

  • Visual and Audio Experience: The game has exquisite graphics with realistic 3D effects. The swimming postures of various fish are natural, and the particle effects of bullet strikes are gorgeous, providing a strong sense of impact. The special effect music when hitting big fish also adds to the fun of the game.

  • Challenge and Sense of Achievement: There are fish of different levels in the game, from easy-to-catch small fish to high-point-value large fish. Players need to continuously improve their skills and strategies to catch fish of higher value and earn more gold coins and a sense of achievement.

  • Diverse Modes: In addition to the regular fishing mode, there are also special mini-game modes such as golden shark mode, pufferfish mode, and treasure chest mode. Each mode has its unique gameplay and challenges, bringing more fun to players.

  • Exploration and Discovery: The game hides various treasures and secrets. Players can explore new areas and discover hidden treasures during the fishing process, increasing the exploratory and surprising aspects of the game.
